block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: The Pinwheel Cube by Tomoko Fuse is a really easy modular origami model. Learn how to fold it with this tutorial. To fold the Pinwheel Cube you will need 6 piece of square paper for each face of the cube. 0:00 Model Name and Designer 0:08 How to Fold the Module 2:25 Completed Module 2:40 Model Assembly 4:27 Completed model Here at Heap Art, we are trying to inspire people to practice origami. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please subscribe to my channel for weekly tutorials. You could use the following link to subscribe to by channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel Sunday : Bonus Video, either a Vlog or a more Involved Origami Model.

block_list.title: More Designs from Tomoko Fuse
block_list.body:
• Octagonal Box (Lid and Base) by Tomoko Fuse
  • Pinwheel Cube by Tomoko Fuse
